title: Reducing opioids not associated with lower patient satisfaction scores, study finds

title_detail.value: Reducing opioids not associated with lower patient satisfaction scores, study finds

summary: A study of nearly 2,500 patients who used high doses of opioids for at least six months showed that reducing their opioid use did not lower their satisfaction with care.

summary_detail.value: A study of nearly 2,500 patients who used high doses of opioids for at least six months showed that reducing their opioid use did not lower their satisfaction with care.
